outline:
1. to decline, incline, encamp, bend down, lay siege against
    1. (Qal)
      1. to decline
      2. to encamp
kjv_def: abide (in tents), camp, dwell, encamp, grow to an end, lie, pitch (tent), rest in tent.
strongs_def: properly, to incline; by implication, to decline (of the slanting rays of evening); specifically, to pitch atent; gen. to encamp (for abode or siege)
